name: Azer
description:
As a indie game developer i made this game for the weekly game jam. I have had a lot of fun that week so i wil continue development and under here you can see the futures i am working on at the moment.

Please dont spread this game iligal,  i put a lot of work and time in this game and i can use the support.

Coming futures:

More songs

Multiplayer

ReDesign of the menu

ReDesign of the in game level

Pause menu
